original_text: I thought about all the people who live on the earth. I realized that one of them would also become king one day. He would rule instead of the other young man who became king. korean_text: 내가 본즉 해 아래에서 다니는 인생들이 왕의 다음 자리에 있다가 왕을 대신하여 일어난 젊은이와 함께 있고

sentences.original_text: I thought about all the people
I realized that one of them
would also become king one day
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 왕이 될 것이라는 것을 깨달았다
